name: veloren-translate
description: Translate Veloren blogposts to bt-BR and es
author: Henrique Ramos

scripts.deploy:rss-digester: gcloud functions deploy digestRssFeed --runtime nodejs --trigger-http --entry-point main --source apps/rss-digester/dist --region us-central1 --set-env-vars RAW_HTML_BUCKET_NAME=$RAW_HTML_BUCKET,RSS_FEED_URL=$RSS_FEED_URL
scripts.deploy:html-to-markdown: gcloud functions deploy htmlToMarkdown --runtime nodejs --trigger-bucket $TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET --entry-point main --source apps/html-to-markdown/dist --region us-central1 --set-env-vars TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET_NAME=$TRANSLATED_HTML_BUCKET,MARKDOWN_BUCKET_NAME=$MARKDOWN_BUCKET --retry
